___specification.description: An order specification that would create an order equivalent to the current state of this order.

___properties.description: Properties of the order not in the specification.

___sequence.description: The account sequence number of the transaction that created this order.

___maker.description: The address of the account that submitted the order.

___makerExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate from the point of view of the account that submitted the order (also known as "quality").
